image_1.description: Nyamut Gai is a 28-year-old woman from South Sudan who lost her children due to disease and hunger during her journey from Sudan back to South Sudan.
image_1.reason: The image depicts a scene inside a makeshift shelter or camp, which aligns with the story of Nyamut Gai, who has faced displacement and hardship. The somber and reflective expression of the woman in the image matches the description of Nyamut Gai's experiences.

image_2.description: Russian bomblets used in Ukraine, arranged side by side on a rack. They are conical-nosed and cylindrical with multiple fins, showing signs of wear and rust.

image_3.description: ecuavoley is a sport of Ecuadorian origin, played in Queens, New York, particularly by immigrants from Ecuador, and is considered a national sport alongside soccer.
